Title: Provides for equitable disability policies
Summary: Provides for equitable disability policies; prohibits any difference, on the basis of race, color, religion, sex, marital status, or national origin in the amount or payment of premiums or rate charges, or in the benefits payable, or in any of the other terms or conditions of any policy of disability insurance under the workers' compensation law.
LawCode: Amd ยง226, Work Comp L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the workers' compensation law, in relation to providing equitable disability policies
